backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that manages homepage text formatting settings (font size, family, weight, letter spacing, text transform) for different sections (hero, overview, services, footer), with admin-only update functions and includes authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes default text formatting settings for all homepage sections when upgrading from an old actor version.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of text formatting management across admin panel, frontend components (Hero, Overview, About, Services, Footer), and backend with high confidence test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend components showing text formatting integration across all homepage sections, admin panel with text formatting tab, and React Query hooks for fetching/updating formatting settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the application with title 'Dr. Malay Akechan - General Physician' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Internet Computer domain configuration file specifying 'drmalay.in' as the custom domain.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with error boundary, theme provider, routing between home/blogs views, authentication state management, profile setup modal, and admin panel toggle functionality.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Displays the About section with editable content, doctor credentials card, and text formatting support. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and animated background elements.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClinicsMan: Admin interface for managing clinic locations with CRUD operations, image upload with progress tracking, and form fields for name, address, contact details, hours, map link, and booking URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentMan: Manages website images (hero background, doctor photos, clinic images) and hero section content (headline, subtext, buttons) with upload, edit, and delete functionality using React hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterMana: Provides admin interface for managing footer content including contact info, copyright, sections with drag-and-drop reordering, and quick links with add/edit/delete operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroThemeM: Admin panel for configuring hero section theme settings including theme type, particle effects, motion effects, vector effects, and spacing with real-time preview and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReviewsMan: Manages patient reviews with CRUD operations, image uploads, star ratings, and review panel settings using tabs for reviews and settings configuration with duplicate submission guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServicesMa: Simple admin interface for managing medical services with add, edit, and delete operations for service name and description fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialMedi: Admin component for managing social media links with CRUD operations, including platform, display name, URL, icon size, order, and visibility settings. Uses dialog forms for adding/editing links and displays them in a sortable list.
frontend/src/components/admin/TextFormat: Admin component for customizing text formatting (font family, size, weight, letter spacing, text transform) for different homepage sections. Provides a form interface to edit and save formatting bundles for hero, body, and other text sections.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Main admin panel component with tabbed interface for managing content, hero theme, clinics, services, reviews, social media, footer, and text formatting. Includes close button and responsive tab layout.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogDetail: Displays a single blog post with formatted date, author, and rich content rendering. Includes an edit button for admin users.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogList.t: Displays a list of blog posts sorted by creation date with preview text, metadata, and admin controls for editing/deleting. Includes confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogPostEd: Dialog component for creating and editing blog posts with a block-based editor supporting text and image content blocks. Handles image uploads with progress tracking and converts blocks to RichContentElement format for saving.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichConten: Renders blog post content from RichContentElement array, supporting formatted HTML text, plain text, images with captions, and videos. Applies appropriate styling and lazy loading for media elements.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichTextEd: A rich text editor component with a toolbar for formatting (headings, bold, italic, lists, links, quotes) using contentEditable and document.execCommand.
frontend/src/components/BlogsPage.tsx: Blog posts page with list/detail views, admin editing capabilities, and create/edit dialog. Handles loading states, empty states, and navigation between list and individual posts.
frontend/src/components/Clinics.tsx: Displays clinic locations in a grid layout with cards showing details like address, phone, hours, and appointment links. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/DoctorCredential: Card component displaying doctor credentials (name, qualifications, specializations, experience, achievements) with editable profile image and admin edit dialog. Shows only when content exists or user is admin.
Inline editable text component for website content fields with edit/save/cancel controls. Shows edit button on hover for admins and handles content updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditableFooterCo: Provides inline editing for footer fields (address, phone, email, copyright) with edit/save/cancel controls, visible only to admins.
frontend/src/components/EditableHeroCont: Enables admin editing of hero section content (headline, subtext, buttons) via a dialog modal with text and link inputs.
frontend/src/components/EditableImage.ts: Allows admins to upload and update images (including dark mode variants) with progress tracking and fallback placeholders for missing images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, custom sections, and editable content for admins; includes text formatting and theme support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays sticky header with navigation, authentication controls, theme toggle, and mobile menu; handles routing between home and blogs.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the hero section with background images, editable content, layout presets, glassmorphism effects, and extensive theme customization options.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Mot: Canvas-based animation layer that renders wave or floating motion effects with Material Design elevation, shadows, and configurable speed/amplitude.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Par: Canvas-based particle system rendering bubbles, sparkles, or confetti with Material Design styling, configurable intensity, speed, and smooth animations.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Vec: SVG-based effect layer rendering animated geometric patterns or paths with glow filters, configurable complexity, and color schemes.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroMultiEf: Orchestrates multiple hero effects (particle, motion, vector) by conditionally rendering their respective layer components based on enabled flags.
frontend/src/components/Overview.tsx: Displays an overview section with editable content and four highlight cards (Expert Care, Patient-Centered, Experienced, Trusted) with customizable text formatting. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and admin edit capabilities.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup. Prevents closing until the form is submitted successfully.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Displays patient reviews in a horizontal scrollable carousel with auto-scroll functionality, manual navigation buttons, and configurable settings (max reviews, scroll speed). Includes loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a grid of medical services with customizable text formatting, gradient-styled cards, and icons. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and conditional rendering based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/SocialMedia.tsx: Displays social media links as icon buttons with platform-specific icons (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, GitHub). Supports visibility toggling, custom icon sizes, and gradient styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroLayoutPreset.t: Hook that analyzes hero images to determine optimal layout configuration (content position, overlay strength, container width, text size) based on visual characteristics like brightness, contrast, and busyness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, providing login/logout functionality, identity state management, and integration with @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, website content, clinics, services, reviews, blog posts, and admin authorization checks.
frontend/src/ic-assets.json: Asset configuration for Internet Computer deployment, specifying that .well-known directory should not be ignored.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a high-tech multicolor design system for both light and dark modes, including primary/secondary/accent colors and chart palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/heroImageAnalysis.ts: Client-side image analysis utility that calculates brightness, contrast, visual weight distribution, and busyness metrics from hero background images to inform layout decisions.
frontend/src/utils/heroThemeDefaults.ts: Utility functions for safely handling hero theme data including bigint conversions, clamping, validation, and normalization of positioning, dimensions, and effect settings.
frontend/src/utils/particleEffectTypes.t: Metadata registry for particle effect types (bubbles, confetti, sparkles, etc.) with labels and descriptions, plus helper functions to retrieve human-readable names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including HSL-based color system for UI components (primary, secondary, accent, sidebar, etc.), container settings, border radius variables, and custom box shadows for elevation and glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing a website with admin panel for content/styling management, featuring section-based text formatting controls for homepage components (hero, about, services, footer) with independent font customization for headings and body text.
